AnimationMovies.title: Incredibles 2
AnimationMovies.description: Bob Parr (Mr. Incredible) is left to care for the kids while Helen (Elastigirl) is out saving the world.
AnimationMovies.stars: Craig T. Nelson, Holly Hunter, Sarah Vowell

AnimationMovies.title: Peter Rabbit
AnimationMovies.description: Feature adaption of Beatrix Potter’s classic tale of a rebellious rabbit trying to sneak into a farmer’s vegetable garden.
AnimationMovies.stars: : James Corden, favssal Bazzi, Domhnall Gleeson

AnimationMovies.title: Smallfoot
AnimationMovies.description: A Yeti is convinced that the elusive creatures known as “humans” really do exist.

AnimationMovies.title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
AnimationMovies.description: Spider-Man crosses parallel dimensions and teams up with the Spider-Man of those dimensions to stop a threat to all reality.
AnimationMovies.stars: Nicolas Cage, Hailee Steinfeld, John Mulaney
